## Description {#details}

Class that has the common methods + fields of memory uses/defs.

It&#39;s a little awkward to have, but there are many cases where we want either a use or def, and there are many cases where uses are needed (defs aren&#39;t acceptable), and vice-versa.

This class should never be instantiated directly; make a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryuse">MemoryUse</a> or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorydef">MemoryDef</a> instead.

Definition at line 249 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/memoryssa-h">MemorySSA.h</a>.

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Reset the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of what this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryuse">MemoryUse</a> was optimized to, causing it to be rewalked by the walker if necessary.

This really should only be called by tests.
